cleaned_text: Are you feeling low, tired, or on the verge of sickness? If so, you could be dealing with low immunity. From high-stress levels to nutrient deficiencies and even a poor night of sleep, many factors can cause your immunity to plummet. IV therapy is a simple and ultra-effective way to boost your immune system. Read on to learn more about this popular treatment and how it can fit into your wellness routine. Why Choose IV Therapy? Oral supplements can only go so far in strengthening your immune system. With this administration, a large portion of the nutrients is lost to the digestive process. So, you won't reap the benefits of the full dose of vitamins and minerals that you see on the bottle. [IV therapy](https://mindbodyspiritcare.com/iv-nutritional-therapies-tampa/), on the other hand, delivers a high dose of nutrients directly to the bloodstream. This way, your body can absorb all the immune-boosting nutrients for faster, more noticeable results. Best Types of IV Therapy For Immunity B Vitamins B vitamins, like vitamin B12, support your energy levels and the health of your cells. These benefits promote greater immunity from B vitamin IV therapy. Glutathione Glutathione is an antioxidant that reduces inflammation and improves the body's natural immune response. It's widely used in IV therapy to ward off chronic illness and prevent oxidative stress. Vitamin C Vitamin C has been found to improve [immune cell function](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC5707683/) to prevent and treat infections. A vitamin C IV drip is a great way to quickly boost your immunity so that sickness doesn't derail your schedule. Chelation Therapy [Chelation therapy](https://mindbodyspiritcare.com/chelation-therapy-tampa/) involves delivering the amino acid EDTA to the bloodstream with an IV. EDTA binds to heavy metals and carries them out of the body through urine. This effectively removes toxins that could be triggering inflammation and compromising your immunity.
